metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7115 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: Buffer overflow in the handle_packet function in mactelnet.c in the clientin MAC-Telnet 0.4.3 and earlier allows remote TELNET servers to executearbitrary code via a long string in an MT_CPTYPE_PASSSALT control packet.

criterions.comment: mactelnet: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
